# Managing a bibliography

1.  Download [Zotero](zotero.org)
    -   install *zotero connector* in your browser extensions
2.  Export as BiBTex file: .bib
3.  Store .bib file in your Quarto Book project directory.

### DOI reference

Add reference with `@` symbol and a [*DOI*](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Digital_object_identifier)*.* For example '\@10.1037/amp0000151'

### from my_library.bib

Or, type `@` and begin searching you local .bib files.

For example: George Saunders has a lot to say about conversations in graveyards. @lincoln

### Compiled References

All references will be summarized in the [References](references.html) section of the book.
